issue.title: Terrain rendering does not support shadows and texture blending with Ogre >= 1.11

content.raw:
Hi Sean, in theory the problem discussed in this issue should be just about some missing features in the rendering \(i.e. shadows in the case of terrainmap\) but the execution should work correctly. However, to be perfectly honest I never managed to actually run the Gazebo in vcpkg, and only one user \(see [#!/osrf/gazebo/pull-requests/3130/change-gazebo-rendering-heightmap-class-to/diff#comment-125270000](#!/osrf/gazebo/pull-requests/3130/change-gazebo-rendering-heightmap-class-to/diff#comment-125270000) and [https://github.com/microsoft/vcpkg/pull/8178#issuecomment-552752416](https://github.com/microsoft/vcpkg/pull/8178#issuecomment-552752416)\) was able to run that draft PR correctly.

‌
content.html:
Hi Sean, in theory the problem discussed in this issue should be just about some missing features in the rendering (i.e. shadows in the case of terrainmap) but the execution should work correctly. However, to be perfectly honest I never managed to actually run the Gazebo in vcpkg, and only one user (see #!/osrf/gazebo/pull-requests/3130/change-gazebo-rendering-heightmap-class-to/diff#comment-125270000 and https://github.com/microsoft/vcpkg/pull/8178#issuecomment-552752416) was able to run that draft PR correctly.
